loginPage.title: O AMOGELESEGA GAPE!
loginPage.subtitle: Tswee-tswee tsenya dintlha tsa gago go tsena.
loginPage.emailPlaceholder: Tsenya aterese ya gago ya imeili
loginPage.welcomeImageAlt: Kamogelo ya go Tsena mo Mavito
loginPage.errorTokenMissing: O tsene sentle, mme ga go na tokene e e amogetsweng. Tswee-tswee ikgolaganye le thuso.
loginPage.errorDefault: Go tsena go paletswe. Tswee-tswee tlhola dintlha tsa gago.
loginPage.errorUnexpectedFormat: Phoso ya go tsena (maemo {{status}}). Sebopego sa phoso se se sa solofetswang.
loginPage.errorWithStatus: Go tsena go paletswe (maemo {{status}}). Tswee-tswee leka gape.
loginPage.errorUnknownNetwork: Go diragetse phoso e e sa itseweng ya neteweke. Tswee-tswee leka gape.

registrationPage.title: SIMOLOLA JAANONG
registrationPage.subtitle: Tlhola akhaonto ya gago ya Mavito.
registrationPage.firstNamePlaceholder: Tsenya leina la gago la ntlha
registrationPage.emailPlaceholder: Tsenya aterese ya gago ya imeili
registrationPage.haveAccount: O setse o na le akhaonto?
registrationPage.errorAgreeToTerms: O tshwanetse go dumela melawana le mabaka.
registrationPage.alertSuccess: O ikwadisitse ka katlego! Tswee-tswee tswelela go tsena.
registrationPage.errorDefault: Go ikwadisa go paletswe. Tswee-tswee leka gape.
registrationPage.errorWithStatus: Go ikwadisa go paletswe (maemo {{status}}). Tswee-tswee leka gape.
registrationPage.errorUnknownNetwork: Go diragetse phoso e e sa itseweng ya neteweke. Tswee-tswee leka gape.
